entities.name: polyjuice potion
entities.description: The Polyjuice Potion is mentioned as 157. It is a potion that has the power to change one's appearance.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a student at Hogwarts who is being targeted by people due to his fame.

entities.name: justin
entities.description: Justin is a person who was attacked along with Nearly Headless Nick.

entities.name: nearly headless nick
entities.description: Nearly Headless Nick is a ghost at Hogwarts who was attacked.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is Harry's friend and classmate.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is Harry's friend and classmate.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is a student at Hogwarts who is staying over the holidays along with Crabbe and Goyle.

entities.name: crabbe
entities.description: Crabbe is a student at Hogwarts who is staying over the holidays along with Malfoy and Goyle.

entities.name: goyle
entities.description: Goyle is a student at Hogwarts who is staying over the holidays along with Malfoy and Crabbe.

entities.name: hogwarts express
entities.description: The Hogwarts Express is a train that students take to go home for Christmas.

relationships.description: Harry is connected to the Polyjuice Potion, which is mentioned as 157.
Ron is a friend of Harry's.
Hermione is a friend of Harry's.
Crabbe is a friend of Malfoy's.
Goyle is a friend of Malfoy's.
The Hogwarts Express is used by students to go home for Christmas.
